Description: Our eBay Store About Us Epiphone Les Paul Custom PRO Electric Guitar (Alpine White) The Epiphone Les Paul Custom PRO continues the Les Paul legend and tradition of quality and performance that is stronger than ever after 6 decades. The Les Paul Custom Pro is a faithful reproduction of the original classic high-end Les Paul model. From its inception in 1954, the Les Paul Custom combined stunning elegance with maximum playability and tone. Sporting a solid mahogany body and gold hardware, the Les Paul Custom has caught many an eye while attracting the ears of guitarists everywhere. The body is also capped with a carved maple top, capturing the iconic look of the Les Paul Custom we’ve loved for decades. To preserve the tradition of unsurpassed tone, the Les Paul Custom PRO is outfitted with a pair of ProBucker humbucking pickups. These Alnico II equipped pickups deliver the sounds of decades past, yet capable of the most up to the minute molten metal tones. The electronics are completed by the traditional layout of two separate volume and tone controls for each pickup. The tone controls feature a push/pull coil-tapping system to further expand the tonal versatility of this Les Paul, along with three-way switch.A mahogany neck is carved to a comfortably slim tapered 60s style profile. The neck is capped with 22 medium jumbo frets, a rosewood fingerboard with pearloid block inlays, and a radius of 12" for easy playability and smooth effortless string-bending. The headstock is adorned with the traditional split-diamond design.All the glory of yesteryear is preserved, while retaining a look and feel that’s contemporary as ever. The Epiphone Les Paul Custom PRO is rounded out by a set of premium Grover kidney-button tuners along with a chromed Tune-O-Matic bridge and stop tailpiece combo. Case not included.Features:Top: Maple veneerBody: MahoganyNeck: MahoganyNeck Shape: SlimTaper "D" profile with a satin finishNeck Joint: Glued-inTruss Rod: AdjustableScale Length: 24.75"Fingerboard: Rosewood with pearloid block inlaysNeck Pickup: ProBucker-2 (4-wire)Bridge Pickup: ProBucker-3 (4-wire)Controls: Epiphone all-metal 3-way pickup selectorneck pickup volume with push/pull coil-tapping,bridge pickup volume with push/pull coil-tapping,neck pickup tone,bridge pickup toneBinding: Body Top (5-ply white/black); Body Back (5-ply white/black); Fingerboard (1-ply white); Headstock (5-ply white/black); Body(1-ply cream)Fingerboard Radius: 12"Frets: 22 medium jumboBridge: LockToneTailpiece: StopbarNut Width: 1.68"Hardware: GoldMachine Heads: Grover 14:1Case: Not includedSee for yourself why the legend of the mighty Les Paul continues to grow through the years.
